BreadcrumbDescription: I told the monk of my vision. He was clearly unsettled by what I described. He told me to search the mountains to the north for a hermit who may be connected to these dark events.
BreadcrumbHeader: Find the hermit in the pass east of Nevesk.
Name: In Search of Answers
